desc: Buff for you and allies in your Aura: All units ATK bonus +40% and you (only) ATK Bonus +20% to all units. Lasts 15 minutes
Buff for you and your Allies in your Aura: All units ATK Bonus +30%. Buff for you (only): All units HP Bonus +30%. Lasts for 10 minutes.
Randomly get 1~3 Relics in the Deep chests
